long_description: Named after the windsurfing mecca in Maui, these rimless Maui Jim Ho'okipa sunglasses protect your eyes from the sun and feature polarized technology. Maui Jim polarization blocks glare and UV from all angles while managing harmful blue light and boosting colors for clarity and contrast. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Front and back of lenses feature a proprietary, silicone-based hard coating that provides excellent scratch resistance. Extremely impact-resistant, lightweight Grilamid nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Rectangle frame shape is ideal for large face sizes. Rubber nose pads and temple ends prevent slippage. Maui Jim Ho'okipa sunglasses come with a semirigid case and a soft pouch for cleaning and storage.
short_description: Named after the windsurfing mecca in Maui, these rimless Maui Jim Ho'okipa sunglasses protect your eyes from the sun and feature polarized technology.
